snippet.title: Tap My Katamari - Android/IOS - Restore the Universe!
snippet.description:
10 years after the original Katamari game, the King of All Cosmos and the Prince are back to restore the universe and its stars in the new mobile game Tap My Katamari! Use your Katamari, a magical sticky ball, to gather ever bigger objects and grow it to a legendary size! 

Tap My Katamari will be available soon on the App Store and Google Play Store! 

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu and talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.bandainamcoent.eu/community
